title: Ensure 'Allow users to apply sensitivity labels for content' is enabled
description: Enable sensitivity labels in Microsoft Fabric to help classify and protect data according to its sensitivity.
displayName: Ensure 'Allow users to apply sensitivity labels for content' is enabled
rationale: Applying sensitivity labels helps organizations classify and protect data based on its sensitivity, reducing the risk of data leaks and ensuring compliance.
impact: Users will be able to classify and protect content, but may require training on label usage.

remediation.text:
1. Navigate to Microsoft Fabric https://app.powerbi.com/admin-portal
2. Select Tenant settings.
3. Scroll to Information protection.
4. Enable 'Allow users to apply sensitivity labels for content'.
